en-US.summary: A friendly chat partner for teenagers
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Galaxy Teacher how are you
Alexa, tell Galaxy Teacher I had a cool day
en-US.name: Galaxy Teacher
en-US.description: Galaxy Teacher is an AI-powered conversation partner for teenagers. Talk about games, school, ideas, or just chat about your day. The chat partner uses OpenAI to provide natural and friendly conversations.

examplePhrases: Alexa, frage Galaxy Teacher wie geht's
Alexa, sage Galaxy Teacher ich hatte einen coolen Tag
de-DE.name: Galaxy Teacher
de-DE.description: Galaxy Teacher ist ein KI-gestützter Gesprächspartner für Teenager. Rede über Spiele, Schule, Ideen oder einfach über deinen Tag. Der Chat-Partner nutzt OpenAI, um natürliche und freundliche Gespräche zu führen.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Requires OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable to be set in Lambda configuration.
